question: Graphic design mein 'kerning' ka kya matlab hai?
options: Do characters ke beech space ko adjust karna
Ek line mein sabhi characters ke beech space ko adjust karna
Lines ke beech vertical space ko adjust karna
answer: Do characters ke beech space ko adjust karna

question: RGB color model mein kaun se teen primary colors hote hain?
answer: Red, Green, Blue

question: Nimn mein se kaun se graphic design ke mool tatva (basic elements) hain? (Ek se adhik chunein)
answer: Line
Shape
Texture

question: Vector graphics aur Raster graphics mein kya mukhya antar hai?
options: Vector graphics mathematical equations par aadharit hote hain aur quality khoye bina scale kiye ja sakte hain, jabki Raster graphics pixels par aadharit hote hain.
Raster graphics mathematical equations par aadharit hote hain.
Vector graphics hamesha Raster graphics se behtar hote hain.
Vector graphics ka upyog sirf web ke liye hota hai.
answer: Vector graphics mathematical equations par aadharit hote hain aur quality khoye bina scale kiye ja sakte hain, jabki Raster graphics pixels par aadharit hote hain.

question: Typography mein 'serif' font ki kya visheshta hai?
options: Characters ke strokes ke ant mein chhote decorative lines hote hain.
Characters ke strokes ke ant mein koi decorative lines nahi hote hain.
answer: Characters ke strokes ke ant mein chhote decorative lines hote hain.

question: CMYK color model ka upyog aam taur par kahan hota hai?
answer: Print design

question: Design mein 'hierarchy' ka kya mahatva hai?
options: Sabse mahatvapurna elements par viewer ka dhyan aakarshit karna
Sabhi elements ko ek jaisa dikhana
answer: Sabse mahatvapurna elements par viewer ka dhyan aakarshit karna

question: Adobe Creative Suite ke kaun se software aam taur par graphic designers dwara upyog kiye jaate hain? (Ek se adhik chunein)
answer: Adobe Photoshop
Adobe Illustrator
Adobe InDesign

question: Ek logo design karte samay kin baaton ka dhyan rakhna chahiye? (Ek se adhik chunein)
answer: Saralta (Simplicity)
Yaadgaar (Memorable)
Bahumukhi (Versatile)

question: 'White space' ya 'negative space' design mein kya bhumika nibhata hai?
options: Design ko saaf aur padhne mein aasan banata hai
Yeh space ka bekar istemal hai
Design ko bhara hua dikhata hai
Sirf kaale aur safed design mein upyog hota hai
answer: Design ko saaf aur padhne mein aasan banata hai

question: Color theory mein 'complementary colors' kya hote hain?
options: Color wheel par ek doosre ke vipreet rang
Color wheel par ek doosre ke bagal mein rang
Ek hi rang ke alag-alag shades
Koi bhi teen rang jo ek saath achhe lagte hain
answer: Color wheel par ek doosre ke vipreet rang

question: File format .PNG ki kya visheshta hai?
options: Yeh hamesha choti file size ka hota hai
Yeh print ke liye sabse achha hai
answer: Transparent background support karta hai

question: Design mein 'alignment' ka kya matlab hai?
options: Elements ko ek line ya margin ke saath kaise rakha gaya hai
answer: Elements ko ek line ya margin ke saath kaise rakha gaya hai

question: Ek 'mood board' kya hai?
options: Images, colors, aur textures ka ek collection jo ek project ke liye visual direction deta hai
answer: Images, colors, aur textures ka ek collection jo ek project ke liye visual direction deta hai

question: Nimn mein se kaun se file formats aam taur par web ke liye upyog kiye jaate hain? (Ek se adhik chunein)
answer: JPEG
PNG
SVG

question: 'Golden Ratio' ka graphic design mein kya upyog hai?
options: Esthetically pleasing compositions banane ke liye
File size kam karne ke liye
Website ki speed badhane ke liye
answer: Esthetically pleasing compositions banane ke liye

question: Typography mein 'leading' (line-height) kya hai?
options: Text ki lines ke beech ka vertical space
answer: Text ki lines ke beech ka vertical space

question: Ek 'brand style guide' mein kya shamil hota hai? (Ek se adhik chunein)
answer: Logo usage guidelines
Color palette
Typography rules

question: Adobe Illustrator ka mukhya upyog kya hai?
options: Vector graphics aur illustrations banane ke liye
answer: Vector graphics aur illustrations banane ke liye

question: Design mein 'contrast' kaise banaya ja sakta hai? (Ek se adhik chunein)
options: Sabhi elements ko ek jaisa banakar
answer: Rang (Halke vs. Gehre)
Size (Bade vs. Chhote)
Shape (Geometric vs. Organic)

question: Resolution (DPI/PPI) ka kya mahatva hai?
options: Image ki quality aur sharpness nirdharit karta hai
Image ka file size nirdharit karta hai
Image ka color mode nirdharit karta hai
Image ka file format nirdharit karta hai
answer: Image ki quality aur sharpness nirdharit karta hai

question: Print ke liye standard resolution kya hai?
answer: 300 DPI

question: Web/screen ke liye standard resolution kya hai?
answer: 72 PPI

question: Adobe InDesign ka mukhya upyog kya hai?
options: Layout aur page design ke liye (jaise magazines, books)
answer: Layout aur page design ke liye (jaise magazines, books)

question: Design mein 'repetition' ka siddhant kya hai?
options: Design ke elements ko poore piece mein dohrana
Sirf ek rang ka upyog karna
answer: Design ke elements ko poore piece mein dohrana

question: Ek 'wireframe' kya hai?
options: Ek website ya app ka basic structural layout
answer: Ek website ya app ka basic structural layout

question: Color theory mein 'analogous colors' kya hote hain?
options: Color wheel par ek doosre ke bagal mein sthit rang
Color wheel par ek doosre ke vipreet sthit rang
Ek hi rang ke alag-alag shades
answer: Color wheel par ek doosre ke bagal mein sthit rang

question: Adobe Photoshop mein 'layers' ka kya upyog hai?
options: Image ke alag-alag hisson ko organize aur edit karne ke liye
Image ko save karne ke liye
Image ka size badalne ke liye
Image par filter lagane ke liye
answer: Image ke alag-alag hisson ko organize aur edit karne ke liye

question: Nimn mein se kaun se 'Gestalt principles' hain? (Ek se adhik chunein)
answer: Proximity (Sameepata)
Similarity (Samanata)
Closure (Samapan)

question: Ek 'mockup' kya hai?
options: Ek design ka static, high-fidelity visual representation
answer: Ek design ka static, high-fidelity visual representation

question: Typography mein 'tracking' (letter-spacing) kya hai?
options: Ek shabd ya text block mein characters ke beech overall space
Do specific characters ke beech space
answer: Ek shabd ya text block mein characters ke beech overall space

question: Design mein 'balance' kaise prapt kiya ja sakta hai? (Ek se adhik chunein)
answer: Symmetrical balance
Asymmetrical balance
Radial balance

question: File format .SVG ka kya fayda hai?
options: Yeh ek vector format hai aur anant tak scale kiya ja sakta hai
Yeh photo-realistic images ke liye sabse achha hai
Yeh hamesha sabse chhota file size deta hai
Yeh print ke liye banaya gaya hai
answer: Yeh ek vector format hai aur anant tak scale kiya ja sakta hai

question: User Interface (UI) design ka mukhya uddeshya kya hai?
options: Ek product ka visual look aur feel design karna
Ek product ka overall user experience design karna
answer: Ek product ka visual look aur feel design karna

question: User Experience (UX) design ka mukhya uddeshya kya hai?
options: Ek product ko upyog mein aasan, kushal aur ananddayak banana
Sirf product ka sundar dikhna sunishchit karna
Product ke features ki list banana
answer: Ek product ko upyog mein aasan, kushal aur ananddayak banana

question: Ek 'grid system' ka design mein kya upyog hai?
options: Content ko organize aur structure karne ke liye
answer: Content ko organize aur structure karne ke liye

question: Color psychology kya hai?
options: Rangon ka manav bhavnaon aur vyavahar par prabhav ka adhyayan
Rangon ko mix karne ka vigyan
Digital screens par rangon ka pradarshan
answer: Rangon ka manav bhavnaon aur vyavahar par prabhav ka adhyayan

question: Nimn mein se kaun se 'warm colors' hain? (Ek se adhik chunein)
answer: Red
Orange
Yellow

question: Nimn mein se kaun se 'cool colors' hain? (Ek se adhik chunein)
answer: Blue
Green
Purple

question: Ek 'icon' aur 'logo' mein kya antar hai?
options: Logo ek brand ka pratinidhitv karta hai, jabki icon ek action ya object ka pratinidhitv karta hai
Icon hamesha logo se bada hota hai
Logo mein hamesha text hota hai, icon mein nahi
answer: Logo ek brand ka pratinidhitv karta hai, jabki icon ek action ya object ka pratinidhitv karta hai

question: Design mein 'rhythm' ka kya arth hai?
options: Elements ki punravritti (repetition) se banaya gaya ek visual movement
Sabhi elements ko randomly place karna
Sirf ek element ka upyog karna
answer: Elements ki punravritti (repetition) se banaya gaya ek visual movement

question: File format .GIF ka mukhya upyog kya hai?
options: Simple animations aur limited colors wali images ke liye
answer: Simple animations aur limited colors wali images ke liye

question: Ek 'infographic' kya hai?
options: Jankari, data ya gyan ka ek visual representation
answer: Jankari, data ya gyan ka ek visual representation

question: Design mein 'proportion' ka kya matlab hai?
options: Elements ke size aur scale ka ek doosre se sambandh
answer: Elements ke size aur scale ka ek doosre se sambandh

question: Adobe Photoshop mein 'path' tool (Pen tool) ka kya upyog hai?
options: Precise selections aur custom shapes banane ke liye
Image ko crop karne ke liye
answer: Precise selections aur custom shapes banane ke liye

question: Ek 'prototype' kya hai?
options: Ek design ka interactive model jise test kiya ja sakta hai
answer: Ek design ka interactive model jise test kiya ja sakta hai

question: Design mein 'unity' kaise prapt ki jaati hai?
options: Jab design ke sabhi tatva ek saath milkar ek samagra (cohesive) anubhav banate hain
Jab har tatva alag dikhta hai
Jab bahut saare rangon ka upyog hota hai
Jab koi grid system nahi hota hai
answer: Jab design ke sabhi tatva ek saath milkar ek samagra (cohesive) anubhav banate hain

question: Sans-serif font ki kya visheshta hai?
options: Characters ke strokes ke ant mein decorative lines (serifs) nahi hote hain
Characters ke strokes ke ant mein decorative lines hote hain
Yeh hamesha handwritten style mein hota hai
Yeh sirf headings ke liye upyog hota hai
answer: Characters ke strokes ke ant mein decorative lines (serifs) nahi hote hain

question: Ek 'stock photo' kya hai?
options: Ek professional photo jise creative projects ke liye license kiya ja sakta hai
answer: Ek professional photo jise creative projects ke liye license kiya ja sakta hai

question: Design mein 'focal point' kya hai?
options: Design ka woh hissa jo sabse pehle viewer ka dhyan khinchta hai
answer: Design ka woh hissa jo sabse pehle viewer ka dhyan khinchta hai

question: Hexadecimal (Hex) color code kya hai?
options: Web design mein rangon ko represent karne ka ek 6-digit code
Print design mein rangon ko represent karne ka ek code
answer: Web design mein rangon ko represent karne ka ek 6-digit code

question: Design mein 'texture' ka upyog kaise kiya ja sakta hai? (Ek se adhik chunein)
options: Visual interest add karne ke liye
Ek specific mood ya feeling evoke karne ke liye
Depth aur dimension ka aabhas dene ke liye
Text ko padhne mein mushkil banane ke liye
answer: Visual interest add karne ke liye
Ek specific mood ya feeling evoke karne ke liye
Depth aur dimension ka aabhas dene ke liye

question: Ek 'gradient' ya 'color blend' kya hai?
options: Ek rang ka doosre rang mein kramik (gradual) transition
answer: Ek rang ka doosre rang mein kramik (gradual) transition

question: Adobe Photoshop mein 'blending modes' ka kya kaam hai?
options: Yeh nirdharit karte hain ki do layers ek doosre ke saath kaise interact karte hain
Yeh layers ko merge karte hain
Yeh layers ko delete karte hain
answer: Yeh nirdharit karte hain ki do layers ek doosre ke saath kaise interact karte hain

question: Ek 'monochromatic' color scheme kya hai?
options: Ek hi rang ke alag-alag tints, tones, aur shades ka upyog
Bahut saare alag-alag rangon ka upyog
Sirf kaale aur safed rang ka upyog
answer: Ek hi rang ke alag-alag tints, tones, aur shades ka upyog

question: File format .EPS ka mukhya upyog kya hai?
options: High-quality printing aur scaling ke liye vector graphics store karna
answer: High-quality printing aur scaling ke liye vector graphics store karna

question: Design mein 'pattern' ka kya arth hai?
options: Elements ya motifs ki ek niyamit (regular) punravritti
answer: Elements ya motifs ki ek niyamit (regular) punravritti

question: Ek 'brief' (design brief) kya hai?
options: Ek document jo design project ke goals, scope, aur requirements ko outline karta hai
answer: Ek document jo design project ke goals, scope, aur requirements ko outline karta hai

question: Flat design kya hai?
options: Ek minimalist design style jo shadows, gradients jaise 3D effects se bachta hai
Ek design style jo bahut saare 3D effects ka upyog karta hai
Ek design style jo sirf kaale aur safed rang ka upyog karta hai
answer: Ek minimalist design style jo shadows, gradients jaise 3D effects se bachta hai

question: Design mein 'accessibility' ka kya matlab hai?
options: Design ko is tarah banana ki divyang (disabled) log bhi use aasani se upyog kar sakein
Design ko sirf ek specific audience ke liye banana
Design ko print karna aasan banana
answer: Design ko is tarah banana ki divyang (disabled) log bhi use aasani se upyog kar sakein

question: Ek 'watermark' kya hai?
options: Ek halka (faint) logo ya text jo image par copyright protect karne ke liye lagaya jaata hai
answer: Ek halka (faint) logo ya text jo image par copyright protect karne ke liye lagaya jaata hai

question: Material Design kya hai?
options: Google dwara viksit ek design language
Apple dwara viksit ek design language
Microsoft dwara viksit ek design language
answer: Google dwara viksit ek design language

question: Adobe Photoshop mein 'masking' ka kya upyog hai?
options: Ek layer ke hisson ko non-destructively hide ya reveal karne ke liye
Ek layer ke hisson ko permanently delete karne ke liye
Ek naya layer banane ke liye
Do layers ko merge karne ke liye
answer: Ek layer ke hisson ko non-destructively hide ya reveal karne ke liye

question: Ek 'thumbnail sketch' kya hai?
options: Ek idea ka chhota, rough drawing
answer: Ek idea ka chhota, rough drawing

question: Design mein 'emphasis' ka kya arth hai?
options: Ek element ko baaki sabse alag dikhakar us par dhyan kendrit karna
Sabhi elements ko ek jaisa mahatva dena
Design mein kam rangon ka upyog karna
answer: Ek element ko baaki sabse alag dikhakar us par dhyan kendrit karna

question: File format .TIFF ka upyog aam taur par kahan hota hai?
options: High-quality print graphics aur professional photography mein
answer: High-quality print graphics aur professional photography mein

question: Ek 'palette' kya hai?
options: Ek design project mein upyog kiye jaane wale rangon ka ek set
answer: Ek design project mein upyog kiye jaane wale rangon ka ek set

question: Design mein 'movement' kaise banaya jaata hai?
options: Lines, shapes, aur colors ka upyog karke viewer ki aankh ko design ke madhyam se guide karna
Ek grid ka sakhti se palan karke
Sirf ek rang ka upyog karke
answer: Lines, shapes, aur colors ka upyog karke viewer ki aankh ko design ke madhyam se guide karna

question: Ek 'bleed' print design mein kya hota hai?
options: Design ka woh hissa jo page ke final trim size se bahar tak extend hota hai
answer: Design ka woh hissa jo page ke final trim size se bahar tak extend hota hai

question: Responsive design kya hai?
options: Ek aisi web design approach jo alag-alag screen sizes par behtar viewing experience deti hai
Ek aisi web design jo sirf desktop par achhi dikhti hai
Ek aisi web design jo bahut tezi se load hoti hai
Ek aisi web design jo animations ka bahut upyog karti hai
answer: Ek aisi web design approach jo alag-alag screen sizes par behtar viewing experience deti hai

question: Ek 'font family' ya 'typeface' kya hai?
options: Ek common design wale fonts ka ek set (jaise Regular, Bold, Italic)
answer: Ek common design wale fonts ka ek set (jaise Regular, Bold, Italic)

question: Design mein 'opacity' kya control karta hai?
answer: Ek element ki transparency (pardarshita)

question: Ek 'style tile' kya hai?
options: Ek design document jo ek website ke fonts, colors aur interface elements ko ek saath dikhata hai
answer: Ek design document jo ek website ke fonts, colors aur interface elements ko ek saath dikhata hai

question: Design mein 'visual weight' kya hai?
options: Ek element ki viewer ka dhyan aakarshit karne ki kshamata
answer: Ek element ki viewer ka dhyan aakarshit karne ki kshamata

question: Adobe Illustrator mein 'artboard' kya hai?
options: Woh area jahan aap apna artwork banate hain, ek canvas ki tarah
answer: Woh area jahan aap apna artwork banate hain, ek canvas ki tarah

question: Ek 'call to action' (CTA) design mein kya hota hai?
options: Ek button ya link jo user ko ek specific action lene ke liye prerit karta hai
answer: Ek button ya link jo user ko ek specific action lene ke liye prerit karta hai

question: Design mein 'saturation' ka kya matlab hai?
options: Ek rang ki intensity ya shuddhata (purity)
Ek rang ki halkapan ya gehraapan (lightness or darkness)
answer: Ek rang ki intensity ya shuddhata (purity)

question: Ek 'wireflow' kya hai?
options: Wireframes ka ek sequence jo ek user task ko complete karne ke steps dikhata hai
answer: Wireframes ka ek sequence jo ek user task ko complete karne ke steps dikhata hai

question: Design mein 'affordance' ka kya concept hai?
options: Ek object ke gun jo yeh batate hain ki use kaise upyog kiya jaana hai
Ek design ko kitna afford kiya ja sakta hai
answer: Ek object ke gun jo yeh batate hain ki use kaise upyog kiya jaana hai

question: Ek 'persona' UX design mein kya hai?
options: Ek kalpanik character jo ek target user group ka pratinidhitv karta hai
answer: Ek kalpanik character jo ek target user group ka pratinidhitv karta hai

question: Design mein 'gamification' kya hai?
options: User engagement badhane ke liye non-game contexts mein game-like elements ka upyog
Design ko ek khel ki tarah banana
Users ko khelne ke liye protsahit karna
answer: User engagement badhane ke liye non-game contexts mein game-like elements ka upyog

question: A/B testing kya hai?
options: Ek design ke do versions ki tulna karke yeh dekhna ki kaun sa behtar perform karta hai
Ek design ko A aur B grades dena
Ek design ko test na karna
answer: Ek design ke do versions ki tulna karke yeh dekhna ki kaun sa behtar perform karta hai

question: Ek 'heatmap' web design analysis mein kya dikhata hai?
options: Ek webpage par user clicks, taps, aur scrolling behavior ka visual representation
answer: Ek webpage par user clicks, taps, aur scrolling behavior ka visual representation

question: Design mein 'F-Pattern' reading behavior kya hai?
options: Users web content ko F-shape mein scan karte hain: pehle top par, phir neeche, aur phir content ko scan karte hain
Users web content ko Z-shape mein scan karte hain
Users har shabd ko padhte hain
answer: Users web content ko F-shape mein scan karte hain: pehle top par, phir neeche, aur phir content ko scan karte hain

question: Ek 'breadcrumb' navigation kya hai?
options: Ek secondary navigation jo user ko website hierarchy mein unki current location dikhati hai
answer: Ek secondary navigation jo user ko website hierarchy mein unki current location dikhati hai

question: Design mein 'above the fold' ka kya matlab hai?
options: Ek webpage ka woh hissa jo bina scroll kiye dikhta hai
Ek webpage ka woh hissa jo scroll karne ke baad dikhta hai
answer: Ek webpage ka woh hissa jo bina scroll kiye dikhta hai

question: Ek 'hero image' kya hai?
options: Ek website ke homepage par ek bada, prominent banner image
answer: Ek website ke homepage par ek bada, prominent banner image

question: Design mein 'skeuomorphism' kya tha?
options: Ek design style jo real-world objects ki tarah dikhne wale interface elements banata tha
answer: Ek design style jo real-world objects ki tarah dikhne wale interface elements banata tha

question: Ek 'favicon' kya hai?
options: Ek chhota icon jo browser tab mein website ke naam ke saath dikhta hai
answer: Ek chhota icon jo browser tab mein website ke naam ke saath dikhta hai

question: Design mein 'Lorem Ipsum' text ka kya upyog hai?
options: Placeholder text ke roop mein, design layout ko fill karne ke liye
Ek programming language ke roop mein
answer: Placeholder text ke roop mein, design layout ko fill karne ke liye

question: Ek 'grid' mein 'columns', 'gutters', aur 'margins' kya hote hain? (Ek se adhik chunein)
options: Columns vertical blocks hote hain jahan content rakha jaata hai
Gutters columns ke beech ka space hota hai
Margins grid ke bahari kinaron par space hota hai
answer: Columns vertical blocks hote hain jahan content rakha jaata hai
Gutters columns ke beech ka space hota hai
Margins grid ke bahari kinaron par space hota hai

question: Ek 'mood' ya 'tone' design mein kaise set kiya ja sakta hai? (Ek se adhik chunein)
answer: Color palette ke madhyam se
Typography ke chunav se
Imagery aur photography style se

question: Ek 'triadic' color scheme kya hai?
options: Color wheel par teen saman doori par sthit rangon ka upyog
Ek hi rang ke shades ka upyog
Chaar rangon ka upyog jo ek rectangle banate hain
answer: Color wheel par teen saman doori par sthit rangon ka upyog
